list.question: Do you offer free quotes?
list.answer: Yes, we are always wanting to ensure we meet your requirements and offer free quotes.

list.question: Can I get current references?
list.answer: Hughes Home Services Ottawa has many happy customers, we are happy to connect you to our clients.

list.question: Is the owner involved in the work?
list.answer: Yes, Wendall Hughes is always on site helping the staff and communicating with the customers.

list.question: Can you work around pets and customers working from home?
list.answer: Yes, helping you around your home no matter the situation is possible.

list.question: Do you have insurance?
list.answer: Of course, any reputable service will have insurance, including Hughes Home Services Ottawa.
